scripts.dev: mkdir -p dist/development && rm -f dist/*.{js,css,map} && brunch build && mv -f dist/*.js dist/development && mv -f dist/*.css dist/development && mv -f dist/*.map dist/development
scripts.prod: mkdir -p dist/production && rm -f dist/*.{js,css,map} && brunch build --production && mv -f dist/*.js dist/production && mv -f dist/*.css dist/production
scripts.start: npm run dev && npm run prod
